name: Ricetta: Sangayaki
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sangayaki.

value.name: Pesce
value.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, può diventare un piatto prelibato.

value.name: Bocca di leone
value.desc:
Commestibile previa cottura.

Come condimento, Può rendere i piatti più saporiti.

value.name: Sale
value.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

value.name: Sangayaki
value.desc: A simple, humble fisherman's side dish. Freshly caught fish is de-skinned and sliced, minced together with Snapdragon, mixed with miso and salt to form a batter, and then finally grilled. The lovely scent enters your nose long before the food enters your mouth. Three servings later, and you're still raring to go for more.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Shimura Kanbei at Shimura's Restaurant</color>
